activatedLines.effectPart: Target creature loses your choice of flying, first strike, or trample until end of turn.
activatedLines.fullLine: {T}: Target creature loses your choice of flying, first strike, or trample until end of turn.

activatedLines.costPart: When Greta enters, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token
activatedLines.effectPart: You gain 3 life.")
activatedLines.fullLine: When Greta enters, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.")

activatedLines.effectPart: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
activatedLines.fullLine: {G}, Sacrifice a Food: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

activatedLines.effectPart: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
activatedLines.fullLine: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a Food: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

activatedLines.effectPart: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
activatedLines.fullLine: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

activatedLines.effectPart: Adapt 4. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)
activatedLines.fullLine: {7}{U}: Adapt 4. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)

activatedLines.effectPart: Add {C}{G}.
activatedLines.fullLine: {T}: Add {C}{G}.

activatedLines.effectPart: Create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
activatedLines.fullLine: {2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

activatedLines.effectPart: Draw a card.
activatedLines.fullLine: Sacrifice three Treasures: Draw a card.

activatedLines.effectPart: Return this creature to its owner's hand.
activatedLines.fullLine: {2}{U}{U}: Return this creature to its owner's hand.

activatedLines.effectPart: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
activatedLines.fullLine: {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

activatedLines.effectPart: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
activatedLines.fullLine: {B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

activatedLines.effectPart: Destroy target creature. If that creature dies this way, create a black Vampire creature token. Its power is equal to that creature's power and its toughness is equal to that creature's toughness.
activatedLines.fullLine: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature. If that creature dies this way, create a black Vampire creature token. Its power is equal to that creature's power and its toughness is equal to that creature's toughness.

activatedLines.costPart: Whenever this creature becomes tapped, create a Lander token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token
activatedLines.effectPart: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.")
activatedLines.fullLine: Whenever this creature becomes tapped, create a Lander token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.")

activatedLines.effectPart: Reveal a card you own from outside the game that has been banned or restricted in a Constructed format and put it into your hand.
activatedLines.fullLine: {B/P}{B/P}{B/P}{B/P}: Reveal a card you own from outside the game that has been banned or restricted in a Constructed format and put it into your hand.

activatedLines.effectPart: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
activatedLines.fullLine: {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

activatedLines.effectPart: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
activatedLines.fullLine: {T}, Sacrifice this land: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

activatedLines.costPart: Artifacts you control have "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact
activatedLines.effectPart: It deals damage to any target equal to 1 plus the number of permanents named Food Fight you control."
activatedLines.fullLine: Artifacts you control have "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: It deals damage to any target equal to 1 plus the number of permanents named Food Fight you control."

activatedLines.effectPart: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
activatedLines.fullLine: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

activatedLines.effectPart: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.)
This creature becomes a Human Warrior with base power and toughness 3/3.
activatedLines.fullLine: {1}{W/B}: This creature becomes a Human Warrior with base power and toughness 3/3.

activatedLines.effectPart: If this creature is a Warrior, it becomes a Human Spirit Warrior with trample and lifelink.
activatedLines.fullLine: {2}{W/B}{W/B}: If this creature is a Warrior, it becomes a Human Spirit Warrior with trample and lifelink.

activatedLines.effectPart: If this creature is a Spirit, put five +1/+1 counters on it.
activatedLines.fullLine: {3}{W/B}{W/B}{W/B}: If this creature is a Spirit, put five +1/+1 counters on it.

activatedLines.effectPart: Add {G} or {U}.)
activatedLines.fullLine: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)

activatedLines.effectPart: Target Sliver creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Slivers on the battlefield."
activatedLines.fullLine: All Slivers have "{T}: Target Sliver creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Slivers on the battlefield."
